name: Trapped With Coffee
description:
Controls: WASD to move.  F to open the book when you are in front of it. F to drink the coffee when you have it. and arrow keys in the book to turn pages 

Chapter Rewards: 

1 cup drank, 50 cups, 100 cups, 250 cups, 300 cups, 500 cups, 800 cups, and 1000 cups

Game made by me.

this is a test build and does not have all the features of the game

 if you would like to support the full game: 

https://www.buymeacoffee.com/MasterAnim

Have Fun :)
